small_cultist.description: A small figure in a dark pink robe. You see a small face from under the cloak, and it whispers something, but you can't hear what.

cultist.description: A tall figure in a dark red robe, hunched over the altar. Their eyes glow with an otherworldly light.

animated_armor.description: A suit of armor gleams menacingly as it moves to block your path.
